body.name: Gotham Steel 14 Inch Non Stick Frying Pans, Family Sized Non Stick Skillet, Large Frying Pan Nonstick Frying Pan, Induction Pan, Nonstick Pan for Cooking, Oven Safe Skillet, Dishwasher Safe–Cream Navy
body.merchantInfo: Sold by REAL CO USA and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: GOTHAM STEEL NATURAL COLLECTION: Healthier cooking is easy with this nonstick ceramic 14” fry pan. It's designed to be 2x more durable, dishwasher safe, and oven safe up to 500˚F. Gold stay-cool handles allow you to go from stovetop to oven. But this fry pan doesn’t just cook good, it looks good too, with a modern cream color that adds an elevated aesthetic to your kitchen.
14 INCH FRYING PAN: Nonstick ceramic coating with even heat distribution to cook eggs, sear scallops, stir fry veggies, and more!

ULTRA NONSTICK CERAMIC SURFACE: Healthy cooking is just a step away. Thanks to a nonstick surface that’s 2x more durable than previous generations, minimal to no oil or butter is needed. And it’s designed to properly conduct heat so food cooks evenly.
NON-TOXIC COATING: Made without PFOA, PFOS, PFAS, PFTE, lead, or cadmium, so it’s safer for you and your family.

EASY TO CLEAN: No more stuck-on bits! Food slides right off when used on low and medium heat as directed. Wipe off with minimal scrubbing. The ceramic coating is stain resistant (and scratch resistant) so no need to worry about tomato sauce, beets, or any other food. Plus this fry pan is designed to be dishwasher safe.
DISHWASHER SAFE: Spend less time on cleanup during busy weeknights. Once you’re done cooking, just place your cookware into the dishwasher for a hassle-free cleaning experience.

EASY TO HANDLE: Easy to lift and move around, from stovetop to oven to table, yet sturdy enough to handle all your cooking needs. Ergonomic handles stay cool to the touch to offer maximum comfort while cooking.
OVEN SAFE TO 500˚F: Go from stovetop to table with ease. Fry pan is compatible with induction, gas, electric, ceramic, and halogen stovetops.
10-YEAR PROMISE: Guaranteed to last for up to 10 years.

GREAT GIFT: Give a practical and thoughtful present: college grads, a wedding shower, newlywed registry, housewarming for new renters and homeowners, or someone who really enjoys cooking with well-made cookware. Or stock a vacation rental with picture-worthy cookware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like this pan
reviews.reviewText: Well made and nonstick for sure.Thing is huge and big enough to feed 6 adults.Just be sure to not put it on highest heat and let things burn on it. That's how you ruin nonstick pans. It seems this would last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful to see
reviews.reviewText: Very nice to look at and even better to cook with. Non stick to the max easy clean up and hopefully good for many years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Large and very easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: Let's start with the things I like about this pan. The ceramic coating on the pan is excellent. Food doesn't stick, and cleaning it is a breeze. I appreciate the fact that I can cook with very little oil or butter, which is especially important for those concerned about calories or cholesterol, like myself. The ceramic coating also appears to be quite durable, as I haven’t noticed any scratches or signs of wear. The pan did arrive with a small chip on the rim, but I don't think that will affect the ceramic finish. The 14" size is also a plus, particularly if you're cooking for a large family or guests.The one think I didn’t care for is the lightweight nature of this pan. While that may appeal to those who prefer lighter cookware, I found that it lacked the heft I like in a large frying pan. The fact that it's lightweight also makes me wonder about longevity. Other than that, this is a nice, large non-stick pan that cleans up easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Huge skillet! Perfect for large-quantity cooking.
reviews.reviewText: I have similar type skillets and thought a 14-inch would be nice to have for cooking larger quantiies. Oh, my! I had no idea how large 14 inches would be! I can cook a lot of food without overcrowding.If you like to cook without much fat, then these ceramic pans are perfect. You can use butter and oil in these, but sparingly and at the appropriate temperature for the fat. For example, extra virgin olive oil would be at a low temperature and butter slightly higher. You definitely want to read the use and care instructions to avoid ruining the non-stick surface. They also recommend that you not use heat above medium except for a short period of time. This is true for all products like this one, as well as for stainless steel pans, which I also use. You always want to let the cool pan before washing it.I like to use butter and oil when cooking because it adds flavor and helps with browning, so it’s a bit of an adjustment when I use ceramic pans. But I can say that nothing sticks in this skillet. I tested it out, making pancakes and eggs. Due to the skillet size, I was able to knock out pancakes super fast and scramble plenty of eggs with ease. Everything came out beautifully. And cleanup was a breeze. I also like that it can go from stovetop to oven. I use that cooking method often with steaks and pork chops.I love the color of this cream and navy pan. It looks as good as it performs. The material is much safer to use because it doesn’t contain the harmful and toxic chemicals of non-stick materials used in pans years ago.This pan will get plenty of use! The only issue for me is where to store it because of its size. But it’s a good problem to have. This pan makes cooking fun and cleanup hassle-free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Replacing all our pans with Gotham Steel
reviews.reviewText: I've moved away from teflon pans a couple years ago and have been using anodized aluminum, but certain foods like eggs are hard to do in aluminum pans since they're not really non-stick. I tried the Gotham Steel grill and it works really well, so I bought this pan also and so far it's amazing! It's true you don't need any oil, butter or non-stick spray. Haven't found anything that sticks to it. The non-stick nature also makes cleanup super easy! I would recommend treating the pan with care and not using metal utensils (plastic or wood only), and using a soft sponge when washing it. Also as with any pan, you need to have basic cooking skills to not put the heat too high unless you're frying. Even pan frying only requires 3/4 heat. Gotham Steel has definitely changed the game for dishes I can enjoy without the messy cleanup and maintaining the high quality of the dishes we like to achieve. I never thought I'd enjoy or even entertain the thought of making a juicy fish filet anywhere other than on our grill but this pan has proved me wrong! The meat treat cooked evenly throughout. I like mine closer to medium rare. Not only was the end result delicious, the cleanup was a Snap! What appeared to be caked on residue, which I allowed to cool down before attempting to clean, wiped off almost 100% with a paper towel with the rest falling off into the sink with a bit of running water and soap. It nearly took me less time to clean this pan in the sink than it would have to get it prepped and put in the dishwasher like other pans. We are now in the process of replacing all of our pans with Gotham Steel. Now I love to make pasta dishes, eggs and more without dreading the cleanup process!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice big pan
reviews.reviewText: I was not expecting this pan to be big at all. I love the size. I can fit quite a bit of food in this pan to feed my big family. I've grilled chicken, made pasta, fried steak. It is absolutely the perfect pan. I need more pans such as this to match. As much as I have cooked in this pan it has yet to get a scratch. i love the thick coating they place on the pan. I would not use any metal utensils just to ensure the life of the pan. The heat is distributed throughout. There aren't any areas where the food doesn't cook. This came to my surprise because of the size. Some big pans you have to move the food around in order to cook thoroughly. If this has a set, get the set. Get all of the matching pieces. Cleaning is headache free. Does not feel like a cheap pa, it definitely has some weight to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t come with a lid
reviews.reviewText: It says it was to come with a lid (which I screenshot but couldn’t upload) but it did not. False advertising should not be allowed!
